column5: Just got back from the boat show. Lots to see and I found it very enjoyable. Lots of nice boat packages with incentives to buy. I think I caught  Eboata . Got a good deal on a mustang HIT inflable pfd
Our 84 cent dollar is a big factor down there.  Boats and motors are likely up this year  Did you notice ?

I was also at the show, lots of good deals if you're looking to buy new. There are the usual good deals on PFDs and the like as well. I will say the show seemed quieter than last year for the first day. There were a decent number of people, it just wasn't nearly as busy and from talking to a few friends that work the show, they seemed to agree. It will be interesting to see how the show shapes up in terms of sales and purchasing
I thought the prices were pretty fair but very competive.
